events.message: The insured reported a car accident that took place at an intersection involving a third vehicle. Initial details have been noted.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords and incident description provided by the claimant.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to handle this automobile accident to ensure a prompt and fair resolution.
The insured person received confirmation that their accident claim has been officially acknowledged and is under review.
Request sent to the claimant for submission of vehicle repair estimates, police report, and photographs of the collision.
Claimant provided all requested documents including repair invoices and the official police accident report in a timely manner.
A thorough investigation has commenced to verify liability and to assess the extent of the damage to the insured vehicle.
Investigation finalized confirming fault of the third party and validating the insured's damages as claimed.
The insurance company proposed a settlement amount covering repairs and rental car expenses for the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and indicated willingness to accept the offer.
Claim was officially approved based on the investigation findings and the agreed upon settlement terms.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued to the claimant's account as per agreement.
The claimant's auto accident claim has been officially closed following the successful settlement and payment.
All case documents and records related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
